## Software used in HYDRA-EO tutorials

This page summarises the main R packages and tools used in the tutorials, with links to their Git repositories and simple usage examples.

::: {.card-grid}

::: {.vbl-card}
<div class="pill-mini">R · ToolsRTM</div>
### Canopy & leaf RTMs
Forward simulations of PROSAIL, INFORM, SPART and MARMIT at satellite band resolution.  
GitLab: <a href="https://gitlab.com/caminoccg/toolsrtm" target="_blank" rel="noopener">ToolsRTM</a>
:::

::: {.vbl-card}
<div class="pill-mini">R · SCOPEinR</div>

### Energy balance & SIF

Interface to the SCOPE model for canopy fluxes, temperature and fluorescence.  
GitLab: <a href="https://gitlab.com/caminoccg/scopeinr" target="_blank" rel="noopener">SCOPEinR</a>
:::

:::
